title: Didn't gain LP from last ranked game I won
body:
Hey, I didn't gain any LP from my last ranked game. This has happened to me before and I was wondering why its happening and if anyone could help me fix this issue. Thanks! 

My op.gg https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Dravne

replies.body: I did a little bit of digging and it looks like the last match you won gave you +22 LP, putting you at 44. If you think that might be wrong, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go a little more in detail there!
